page.title: 07HEALTH Social Welfare
page.content: The Sisters of our Lady of Grace and Compassion serve the old,the sick and the poor in sheltered housing and homes throughout Southern England and in parts of India and Sri Lanka. In the county of Sussex they have the most residential homes, providing 200 beds,where old people needing care will be looked after as they grow older.They also have a nursing unit for 24 very ill patients.{ { Holy Cross Priory}near Heathfield, the largest home, is found in beautiful countryside.A League of Friends work to support Holy Cross and they have provided Holy Cross with a number of new things including- hoists for use in bathrooms and a colour television and a licence for the television.(Ruth Cousins, Natalie Waite, Mark Baker.)
